text: Joni Lamb (born July 19, 1960) is a Christian broadcaster and the co-founder, vice-president, and executive producer of the Daystar Television Network. She has been involved with Christian television since the mid-1980s. She is known for her work with her husband, Marcus Lamb, with Daystar. ==Other websites== * Daystar Network - Joni Lamb Bio * Daystar Network - "Joni" with Joni Lamb Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Television evangelists Category:People from Greenville, South Carolina Category:Television personalities from Texas
title: Joni Lamb
